title: FC Zorky Krasnogorsk
text:
FC Zorky Krasnogorsk () was a Russian <a href="association%20football">football</a> team based in <a href="Krasnogorsk%2C%20Moscow%20Oblast">Krasnogorsk</a>. It was founded in 1968 and played in the third-tier <a href="Soviet%20Second%20League">Soviet Second League</a> from 1968 to 1969, from 1982 to 1989 and from 2017 to 2020, participating in amateur competitions in other years. For the 2017–18 season, it was licensed to play in the third-tier <a href="Russian%20Professional%20Football%20League">Russian Professional Football League</a>.
The club was dissolved due to lack of financing in June 2020.
